info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 10:03PM MDT until June 30 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL HARDING...NORTHEASTERN QUAY AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 1003 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hayden, or 8 miles west of Amistad, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Amistad, Nara Visa, Hayden and Rosebud. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
